solution_line_template: And the total points of Nathalie and Lizzie when combined is {nathalie_score}+{lizzie_score}= <<{nathalie_score}+{lizzie_score}={lizzie_nathalie_total}>>{lizzie_nathalie_total}.
So, the total score of Aimee is {lizzie_nathalie_total} x {aimee_multiplier} = <<{lizzie_nathalie_total}*{aimee_multiplier}={aimee_score}>>{aimee_score}.
Lizzie, Nathalie, and Aimee's total score is {aimee_score} + {lizzie_nathalie_total} = <<{aimee_score}+{lizzie_nathalie_total}={lizzie_nathalie_aimee_total}>>{lizzie_nathalie_aimee_total}.
Therefore, their teammates were able to score {team_total} - {lizzie_nathalie_aimee_total} = <<{team_total}-{lizzie_nathalie_aimee_total}={teammates_score}>>{teammates_score}.
